title: A STRATEGIC SCENARIO
items.abstract:
<jats:p>Management Training and Development needs for the 1990s are
enumerated in checklist‐style. Cultural understanding in a global
context, the realisation of corporate visions, adaptation to more rapid
change, opportunities for synergy, the development of women managers,
career diversity, managing managers, IT, self‐development, greater
sharing of learning, problem handling, diversification of training
styles – these are all discussed. Omission of certain items is
admitted and opportunity for suggestions offered.</jats:p>

title: Composite intensive cars — an industry scenario

The use of ATM techniques in an evolutionary access scenario
container-title: International Journal of Digital & Analog Communication Systems
items.abstract: <jats:title>Abstract</jats:title><jats:p>The paper describes an approach to providing an integrated access environment from customers to the network, as an example of the new access techniques whose performance and control must be considered. The ability of ATM‐based systems to satisfy the needs of such networks is discussed, and the distinctive control and performance requirements of ATM are considered.</jats:p>

title: Sign of the neutron-proton mass difference in an SU(2)×U(1) supersymmetric toy model: A possible scenario for solving the old puzzle
